definition: China Times (newspaper)/abbr. for 中國時報|中国时报 [Zhong1 guo2 Shi2 bao4]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hit home on the evils of the day (idiom); fig. to hit a current political target/to hit the nub of the matter
to hit the target where it hurts (idiom); fig. to hit home/to hit the nail on the head (in an argument)

sentences.english: I received a letter from my best friend from sixth grade through high school.
sentences.chinese: 那是我从六年级到高中时代最要好的朋友寄来的。

sentences.english: High school was absolutely the time of my life!
sentences.chinese: 高中时代无疑是我一生中最快乐的时光。

sentences.english: One cannot walk and stare at the stars when one has a stone in his shoe.
sentences.chinese: 当一粒石子在他鞋中时，人便不能走路，不能望星。

sentences.english: Six senior high school friend in a luxury vessel held a weekend party.
sentences.chinese: 六个高中时代的老友在一艘豪华游艇上举行周末聚会。

sentences.english: You were my high school sweetheart , And still are.
sentences.chinese: 高中时代，你是我的意中人，一直到。

sentences.english: You're talking about high school with a friend.
sentences.chinese: 你正跟一个朋友聊起你的高中时代。

sentences.english: Who can make you believe something is happening when you're inside a cinema?
sentences.chinese: 当你置身于电影院中时谁能让你相信有事发生呢？

sentences.english: Were you famous during your high school days?
sentences.chinese: 你在高中时代受欢迎吗？

sentences.english: So here is a golden star that flashes red and green when it's low in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 因此当处于低空中时它闪着红绿两种光。

sentences.english: Of course this was 30 years after high school.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这是高中时代30年后的事。

sentences.english: I donot know what to do .
sentences.chinese: 我追朔到了我的高中时代。

sentences.english: High school, love is extravagant product, a few people have to rise.
sentences.chinese: 高中时代，爱情是奢靡品，少数人拥有得起。

sentences.english: If the thinner is re-applied to an acrylic lacquer it will re-dissolve.
sentences.chinese: 如果稀释剂被再次用到丙烯酸漆中时就会溶解。

sentences.english: The proposal of every literary theory by Yang Shen can hit the social problems of the times.
sentences.chinese: 杨慎每个文章理论观点的提出，皆能切中时弊。

sentences.english: Remember when we were in high school together?
sentences.chinese: 还记得我们的高中时代吗？

sentences.english: So in high school I thought I came up with the perfect solution.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我在高中时代就找到了最好的解决方法。

definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
pleasant to the eye/Taiwan pr. [zhong4 kan4]
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
